2.0.5 / 2020-03-11
==================

  - removed duplicated function (crawler#driver(fn))

==================

==================

  - added: automated tests with Travis configuration
  - updated vulnerable dependencies

==================

  * better setter variable for the timeout and allow the driver to be set
